creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by the Peter B. McCord Collection
description: five parts; designed in gold, silver and red lacquer and gold foil on a gold ground with phoenixes and clouds on waves
medium: Lacquer, kinji, silver, red, black hiramakie, takamakie, kirigane, gold foil
title: [Inrō showing a pair of Ho-o birds perched on rocks, clouds, wave pattern]
